Question
========

From each of two normally distributed populations with equal variances a sample is drawn.______________. Sample 1: n = 18, mean = 38, sd = 5.43 Sample 2: n = 13, mean = 46, sd = 9.04. The pooled variance estimator takes the value 51.10. It is tested whether the population averages are equal. The value of the corresponding testing quantity is then

Answerlist
----------

* 1.665
* 2.772
* 3.075
* 0.361

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 1,665: Incorrect
* 2,772: Incorrect
* 3,075: Correct
* 0.361: Incorrect
